abstract: New York Giants defensive end Osi Umenyiora’s signature freeze-chop-club move can be traced to the technique he saw veteran James Hall use in a 2005 game film.
snippet: The Giants Osi Umenyiora’s signature the freeze-chop-club move can be traced to the technique he saw the veteran James Hall use during a 2005 film session.
lead_paragraph: The Giants Osi Umenyiora’s signature the freeze-chop-club move can be traced to the technique he saw the veteran James Hall use during a 2005 film session.

headline.main: Giants’ Umenyiora Perfects Pass-Rush Move, Building Career Around It
headline.print_headline: A Film, and an Edit, Have Led to Show-Stopping Sacks
